items.headline: Self-Hosted Alternative to Tina Cloud (MVP)
items.content: Offering a way to self-host the Tina Cloud backend, to avoid vendor lock-in.

items.headline: Drafts
items.content: Supporting Drafts on a single branch, through a \`draft: true\` frontmatter field.

items.headline: Framework-specific Guides
items.content: As of 1.0, Tina is framework-agnostic (in CMS-only mode). We need some guides on tina.io for configuring Tina with the most popular frameworks.

items.headline: Document Search
items.content: Document Discoverability can be a challenge as the number of posts grow. We're looking into improving this either by providing our own search, or by supporting external search (e.g through Algolia)

items.headline: Registering Multiple Forms Per Page
items.content: The ability to register multiple forms on a page through separate useTina hooks.

items.headline: Improving Media Management UX
items.content:
There are several media management improvements that we have on our list:  

* Built-in support for image metadata
* Image search
* Ability for editor to create nested directories
* Baked-in support for image transformations
* More filetypes (PDF, video, etc)

blocks.content: Welcome to Tina's public roadmap! This is a live document, and will be updated regularly. We'll move tickets to the roadmap once we have a high degree of confidence that they will be worked on in a given time-frame. To submit an idea, or to view a list of feature requests and ideas that we're considering, check out our [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/discussions "GitHub Discussions")
